participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Passionate and nurturing, enjoys nature and caring for animals.
participant_1.background: I like to ride horses. I like to listen to rock music while working. I help tend the fields. I have three arabian horses.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and ambitious, loves sports and helping others.
participant_2.background: I won homecoming queen this year. My current goal is to run a k. I am currently in high school. I make straight as in school. When I grow up, I want to be a physical therapist.

content.text: Yes, I love them! I ride horses all the time.
That's awesome! I only have three Arabian horses, but they're my best friends.
I only have a quarter horse, but she's my best friend too.
What's your favorite thing about horses?
I love their intelligence and their strength. They're amazing creatures.
I agree! I love the way they can be so gentle and loving, but also so strong and powerful.
Me too! I love how they can make me feel safe and secure.
Me too! I love taking them for rides and just being in their presence.
Me too! I love the way they make me feel free and happy.
Me too! I'm so glad we met.
Me too! I love talking about horses.
Me too! We should ride horses together sometime.
That would be awesome! I'll bring my quarter horse.
Perfect! I'll bring my Arabian horses.
